about.faces: Faces of the humans how made it happen
about.a2:
The Doocrate allows us to organize under an event / project and to manage our own tasksThe doocrate is build under the TEAL model which is based on a flat (Non hierarchical) structure
Insatead of an hierarchical community / company - the system allows to self organize and self mangement by small teams that are responsible on their internal operational and their way of communication with other teams in the community
about.a3:
We were searching for a simple intuitive way to share the TEAL way of living
The alternatives were not good enough - either had too many options or didn't fit the model of many humans collaborating
about.q4: Are any other projects are using Doocrate?
about.a4: Sure. You can find them on the All Projects Page
about.q5: I can't do something. Technical support?
about.q6: This is amazing. I want to create my own project
about.a6: Click here to create your own project
about.a7: Here Let's get you out of here
about.a8: We would love to hear your thoughts and ideas. Any feedback or new ways to use this product are welcome. Join our facebook here and message us
about.q9: I'm a developer. How can I help?
about.a9:
You are welcome to join the development -
here are the open tasks Our trello board
Here is the code (Yes we're open source)
If you are looking how to join - contact gal
galbra@gmail.com
about.q10: Who are you wonderful people who invest time in this?
about.a10:
We are part of Metaburn collecitve - our goal is to create simply tools to manage co-creational communities.
We've developedThe dreams platform for burnerot and other international burns
